hero.headline: We design, build, and launch complete applications for visionary teams.
hero.body: OBS is a full-service software engineering company based in Aramoun, Lebanon and specialising in launch-ready web applications, mobile apps, and cloud platforms. We combine research-driven design with reliable engineering to deliver products that scale.

featuredProject.label: Latest Launch
featuredProject.title: OBS Commerce Cloud
featuredProject.description: A composable eCommerce platform engineered for hyper-growth retailers. Built with an event-driven architecture and powered by Firebase.

services.headline: Launch-ready software, delivered end-to-end
services.body: From market validation to production deployment, OBS assembles dedicated product teams to build digital experiences your customers will love.

items.title: Product Discovery & UX
items.description: Align on the right problem before writing a single line of code. We conduct user interviews, prototype journeys, and build design systems to accelerate delivery.

items.title: Full-Stack Engineering
items.description: Our engineers craft resilient frontends and scalable backends with TypeScript, React, Flutter, Firebase, and cloud-native services tailored to your business goals.

items.title: Launch & Growth
items.description: We deploy to secure cloud infrastructure, establish observability, and deliver training so your team can iterate confidently post-launch.

items.title: PulseLink Telemedicine Suite
items.description: Multi-platform virtual care experience connecting patients and clinicians with secure messaging, video visits, and integrated EHR workflows.

items.title: Novus Capital OS
items.description: Cloud-native banking core with modular services for digital wallets, compliance, and risk analytics.

items.title: Orbit360 Experience Platform
items.description: Unified shopping journey that merges in-store beacons, AR product previews, and unified loyalty programs.

process.headline: An integrated process built for velocity
process.body: OBS operates as an extension of your product team. Our multidisciplinary squads bring together product strategists, designers, engineers, and DevOps specialists working in unified sprints.

steps.title: Discover
steps.description: Define product vision, measure success, and prototype customer journeys.

steps.title: Build
steps.description: Iterate through design, development, and QA with continuous stakeholder demos.

steps.title: Launch
steps.description: Deploy to production, enable observability, and train your team for sustained growth.

cta.headline: Ready to ship your next flagship product?
cta.body: Tell us about your idea and we will assemble a dedicated OBS product squad within two weeks.

hero.headline: We are engineers, designers, and product strategists obsessed with outcomes.
hero.body: Since 2011 OBS has been partnering with founders, Fortune 500 enterprises, and public sector teams to build reliable software faster. We believe that the strongest products come from multidisciplinary teams, transparent collaboration, and relentless iteration.

mission.title: Mission
mission.body: Empower teams to launch high-quality digital products with confidence. We do this by combining human-centered design, modern engineering practices, and DevOps excellence.

items.label: Integrity
items.description: Build trust with transparency and ownership.

items.label: Craft
items.description: Sweat the details that elevate experiences.

items.label: Learning
items.description: Evolve with curiosity and continuous improvement.

leadership.headline: The team guiding every OBS engagement

members.name: Maya Collins
members.bio: Oversees product strategy and ensures every OBS engagement aligns with measurable business outcomes for our clients.

members.name: Leonardo Ortiz
members.bio: Leads our engineering practice with a focus on modern cloud architecture, security, and high-performing delivery teams.

members.name: Priya Desai
members.bio: Champions research-driven design and accessible interfaces that users love to adopt and recommend.

engagement.title: Our Engagement Model
engagement.body: Every OBS engagement begins with discovery to de-risk assumptions and map user journeys. We then allocate a dedicated team with the right mix of strategists, UX experts, engineers, QA, and DevOps to deliver iteratively. Weekly demos, shared metrics, and transparent tooling keep stakeholders aligned.

partnerships.title: Engineering Partnerships
partnerships.body: We are proud Firebase partners and have delivered dozens of real-time applications across industries. Our expertise spans serverless backends, automated testing, and multi-cloud deployments using Google Cloud, AWS, and Azure.

careers.title: Join the team
careers.body: We are always looking for engineers, designers, and delivery leads who love solving complex product challenges. Remote-first with collaborative hubs across North America and Europe.

hero.headline: Tell us about your next big launch.
hero.body: Share your project goals and we will assemble the right OBS team within 14 days. We typically respond within one business day.

sidebar.title: Prefer a direct conversation?
sidebar.body: Email us at 12134189a@gmail.com or schedule a video consultation. We work with partners across SaaS, fintech, healthcare, and public sector organisations.

footer.blurb: OBS is a full-cycle software engineering company delivering production-ready apps and web platforms for ambitious teams worldwide.
